page.title: 02LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: The {ROMAN FORT}is just on the side of the A822. There is a gate into it on the side of the road that leads into{ {BRACO.}There are {Defence Ditches}all the way round it,most of them are facing{North.} There are a couple of DEFENCE{DITCHES}facing {south}.There is a big wood next to the fort.It is 1400ft from north to south and nearly 1400ft from west to east.There are only a couple of {defence ditches facing south because it is all swampy just there. The {defence ditches}are dug to tire enemies out when they are attacking the{fort}.There is a {Roman Bridge {over}the river.{Agricola}was born in Gaul, and he was sent over to {Govern {Britain}for 6 years. He built {Ardoch {Roman Fort}in 78AD. {
